SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT361
SwiftMessageFormat.DescriptiveName: Cross Currency Interest Rate Swap Confirmation
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is exchanged by or on behalf of the institutions or corporates, party A and party B, which have agreed to a cross currency interest rate swap covered by a BBAIRS (British Bankers' Association Interest Rate Swap), Deutscher Rahmenvertrag für Finanztermingeschäfte or an ISDA (International Swaps and Derivatives Association) Master Agreement.
The message also covers deals which are not part of an ISDA, Deutscher Rahmenvertrag für Finanztermingeschäfte or BBAIRS Master. In this case, party A and party B must have another bilateral agreement in place, except under AFB (Association Française de Banques) Master (until the AFB does define the interbank confirmation for cross currency swaps, the MT 361 cannot be used to confirm such transactions).
This message may also be sent by a money broker to the two parties (party A and party B) for which the broker arranged the deal.
If there are two money brokers involved in arranging a deal between party A and party B, this message is also exchanged between these money brokers.
The message may be used to:
a) confirm the details of a new transaction between the parties
b) correct a previously sent confirmation
c) cancel a previously sent confirmation.
d) report the details of a transaction to a trade repository.

Validation.Comment: This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
This field must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
This field must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36) :

Code.Name: AMND
Code.Description: Replaces a previously sent message with the amended one contained in this message. Used to add settlement agents to an MT 361 previously sent -or- to correct error(s) in an MT 361 previously sent.

Code.Name: CANC
Code.Description: Cancels a previously sent message. Used to cancel an MT 361 previously sent -or- to cancel an MT 361 which contains erroneous information.

Code.Name: DUPL
Code.Description: Duplicates the same previously sent confirmation. Used to inform the Receiver that a confirmation was already sent by telex, fax or S.W.I.F.T.

Code.Name: NEWT
Code.Description: New confirmation. Used to send an MT 361 for the first time -or- to send a corrected MT 361 when the erroneous one was cancelled using an MT 361 with function CANC.

Validation.Comment: Scope must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T36) :

Code.Name: AGNT
Code.Description: Sender/Receiver is sending/receiving the message on behalf of a third party.

Code.Name: BILA
Code.Description: Bilateral confirmation, ie, Sender and Receiver are the principals.

Code.Name: BROK
Code.Description: The confirmation is sent by a money broker.

Validation.Comment: Settlement Method for this type of deal must contain the following code (Error code(s): T48):

Code.Name: GROSS
Code.Description: All due amounts are to be paid in full.

Validation.Comment: Type of Swap must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T47) :

Code.Name: CORRBUYER
Code.Description: Party A pays the fixed rate leg of a correlation swap

Code.Name: CORRSELLER
Code.Description: Party A pays the floating amounts of annualised realised correlation of a collection of underlying products

Code.Name: FIXEDFLOAT
Code.Description: Party A pays fixed and receives floating rates

Code.Name: FLOATFIXED
Code.Description: Party A pays floating and receives fixed rates

Code.Name: VARBUYER
Code.Description: Party A pays the fixed rate of a variation swap

Code.Name: VARSELLER
Code.Description: Party A pays the floating amounts of annualised realised variance of the price changes of the underlying product

Code.Name: VOLABUYER
Code.Description: Party A pays the fixed rate of a volatility swap

Code.Name: VOLASELLER
Code.Description: Party A pays the floating amounts of annualised realised volatility of a given underlying asset

Code.Description: The non-business date will be adjusted to the first following day that is a business day unless that day falls in the next calendar month, in which case that date will be the first preceding day that is a business day.

Code.Description: The Business Day Convention is specified in field 77D.

Code.Name: PRECEDING
Code.Description: The non-business date will be adjusted to the first preceding day that is a business day.

fieldvalidation.name: C11
fieldvalidation.comment: C11 In the fixed leg payable by party B, either the fixed amounts are used or the rate and Day Count fraction. In the latter case, the period end date adjustment indicator must also be present. Thus, when subsequence B1 is used, the presence of fields 32M, 17F and 14D in subsequence B1 depends on field 37U being present or not as follows (Error code(s): D45)
fieldvalidation.formula: If(B.F37U.$size > 0, SecCount(B.B1, "B1a.32M") == 0 && B.B1.F17F.$size > 0 && B.B1.F14D.$size > 0, SecCount(B.B1, "B1a.32M") == B.B1.B1a.$size && B.B1.F17F.$size == 0 && B.B1.F14D.$size == 0)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In the fixed leg payable by party B, either the fixed amounts are used or the rate and Day Count fraction. In the latter case, the period end date adjustment indicator must also be present. Thus, when subsequence B1 is used, the presence of fields 32M, 17F and 14D in subsequence B1 depends on field 37U being present or not"

fieldvalidation.formula: If(E.F37U.$size > 0, SecCount(E.E1, "E1a.32M") == 0 && E.E1.F17F.$size > 0 && E.E1.F14D.$size > 0, SecCount(E.E1, "E1a.32M") == E.E1.E1a.$size && E.E1.F17F.$size == 0 && E.E1.F14D.$size == 0)
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In the fixed leg payable by party A, either the fixed amounts are used or the rate and Day Count fraction. fieldvalidation.name: C21

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-A
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22C-A Common Reference must contain the bank and location codes of the Sender and Receiver, ie, their BIC without the country code(Error code(s): T95).

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-B
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22C-B This field consists of the bank and location codes (from the ISO Bank Identifier Code) of both the Sender and the Receiver of the MT 361. These codes must appear in alphabetical order (letters take precedence over numbers)(Error code(s): T96).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "This field consists of the bank and location codes (from the ISO Bank Identifier Code) of both the Sender and the Receiver of the MT 361. These codes must appear in alphabetical order (letters take precedence over numbers)."

fieldvalidation.name: FA-22C-C
fieldvalidation.comment: FA-22C-C Location Code 1 and Bank Code 2 are separated by four digits, which must consist of the year (its last two characters) and month of the termination date in field 30P, in the format YYMM (Error code(s): T22).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Location Code 1 and Bank Code 2 are separated by four digits, which must consist of the year (its last two characters) and month of the termination date in field 30P, in the format YYMM"

fieldvalidation.name: FA-72-A

FormulaFunctionDef.name: IsSwiftSequenceEmpty
FormulaFunctionDef.description: Returns false if the sequence is empty. If the sequence has atleast one valid field present, returns true.
